00032 //! Graph widget with internal data sets. The data can be saved as a text file.
00033 //! \sa XQGraph, XGraph
00034 class XWaveNGraph : public XNode
00035 {
00036     XNODE_OBJECT

00041 public:

00048     int colx = 0, int coly1 = 1, int coly2 = -1, int colweight = -1, int colz = -1);
00049  void clearPlots();
00050  unsigned int numPlots() const {return m_plots.size();}
00051  
00052  unsigned int rowCount() const;
00053  unsigned int colCount() const;
00054  double *cols(unsigned int n);
00055  
00056  //! clear all data points

00060  void readUnlock() const;

00063  //! unlock and update graph
00064  void writeUnlock(bool updategraph = true);
00065  
00066  //! \arg plotnum start with zero.
00067  int colX(unsigned int plotnum) const {return m_plots[plotnum].colx;}
00068  //! \arg plotnum start with zero.
00069  int colY1(unsigned int plotnum) const {return m_plots[plotnum].coly1;}
00070  //! \arg plotnum start with zero.
00071  int colY2(unsigned int plotnum) const {return m_plots[plotnum].coly2;}
00072  //! \arg plotnum start with zero.
00073  int colWeight(unsigned int plotnum) const {return m_plots[plotnum].colweight;}
00074  //! \arg plotnum start with zero.
00075  int colZ(unsigned int plotnum) const {return m_plots[plotnum].colz;}
00076  
00077  const shared_ptr<XGraph> &graph() const {return m_graph;}
00078  //! \arg plotnum start with zero.
00079  const shared_ptr<XXYPlot> &plot(unsigned int plotnum) const {return m_plots[plotnum].xyplot;}
00080  const shared_ptr<XAxis> &axisx() const {return m_axisx;}  
00081  const shared_ptr<XAxis> &axisy() const {return m_axisy;}

00086  const shared_ptr<XStringNode> &filename() const {return m_filename;}
